localizerMessages.noEventsInRange: There are no events in this range.

panel.noViewsMessage: Please enable at least one view.

timeRangeType.description: Time Range source used for Calendar
timeRangeType.label: Time Range

colorField.description: Field to use as event color.
colorField.label: Color

descriptionField.description: Field to use for the event description.
descriptionField.label: Description

endTimeField.description: Field to use for the event end time. If not set, event is instant.
endTimeField.label: End time

labelFields.description: Fields to use as event labels.
labelFields.label: Labels

locationField.description: Field to use for the event location.
locationField.label: Location

textField.description: Field to use for the event text. Defaults to the first textual field.
textField.label: Text

timeField.description: Field to use for the event start time. Defaults to the first time field.
timeField.label: Start time

displayFields.description: Fields to show in the event details.
displayFields.label: Details info

locationLabel.description: Specify a custom label for location field.
locationLabel.label: Location label

preformattedDescription.description: Allows to display preformatted text in description.
preformattedDescription.label: Description format

quickLinks.description: Open data link or display drawer when clicking an event.
quickLinks.label: On click

colors.description: Display colors based on Frame or Event id if Color field is not specified.
colors.label: Colors

scrollToTime.description: Set the initial scroll to the selected time.
scrollToTime.label: Scroll To Time
